title: ToolShare
des: A site for sharing, trading, and borrowing tools: a community tradition, brought to the web.

title: AmazingSpace
des: The Amazing Space is an app where you can see photos from multiple Mars rovers and the picture of the day provided by the Nasa API. When the user enters their search, it will take you to that days photo. The date is also saved, so the user can see previous search results..

title: Tech Blog
des: A website that allows the user to sign up/sign in and post blogs. Also allows the user to comment on each blog
